content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! As a large language model, I don't have personal interests, preferences, or the ability to watch TV shows, sports, or any other form of media. I exist solely to provide information and assist with tasks to the best of my abilities.

My purpose is to help users like you with your queries, and I don't have personal experiences or opinions. I can provide information on a wide range of topics, including sports, but I don't have a personal interest in any particular team or league.

So, I wasn't watching Premier League matches or showing interest in Manchester City for my own sake, but rather, I was simply trying to help you with your question and provide some suggestions!
